updates.title: Community Health Initiative Launches in Rural Areas
updates.description: Selam NGO has launched a comprehensive health initiative bringing medical care to underserved rural communities. Our team of healthcare professionals is providing free checkups, medications, and health education to over 5,000 residents.

updates.title: New School Building Completed in Nakuru County
updates.description: After months of construction, our new primary school building is now complete. The facility includes 6 classrooms, a computer lab, and a library, providing education for over 300 students.

updates.title: Clean Water Project Reaches 10,000 Families
updates.description: Our clean water initiative has successfully provided safe drinking water to 10,000 families across multiple counties. Solar-powered water pumps and filtration systems are now operational.
